title: FinFx
author: FinFx
content: https://t.me/market_shockğŸ’ The Cryptorg team has created an algorithm that analyzes the "shock" moments of the futures crypto market with a capacity of 3% and instantly notifies about it. We use innovative momentum detection methods developed by our traders with over 10 years of practical trading experience. For observation, all trading pairs of Binance Futures & Cryptorg Futures were taken, except for pairs with BUSD. Automatic addition of pairs for analysis within a few seconds after the listing.âš¡ï¸ Signals come as notifications to our telegram channel https://t.me/market_shockğŸ•¹ Full documentation https://support.cryptorg.net/ctg-en/market-shock/In the documentation, I described three options for working with such notifications. For an active trader, the main thing is to catch the volatility that arises behind the impulses and trade it.ğŸ„ğŸ»â€â™‚ï¸ The tool is available to everyone. So feel free to share this useful channel with your friends.I recommend that everyone who actively trades intraday set a sound signal for notifications from the channel so as not to miss important moments of market activity!
